references.paper_title: Vision-and-Language Navigation: Interpreting Visually-Grounded Navigation Instructions in Real Environments
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of Vision-and-Language Navigation (VLN), introducing the core task and benchmark that the current research builds upon.

references.paper_title: VLN-BERT: A Recurrent Vision-and-Language BERT for Navigation
references.reason: This paper proposes VLN-BERT, a significant advancement in VLN models, improving performance through a recurrent vision-and-language model which directly influenced several of the cited works.

references.paper_title: History Aware Multimodal Transformer for Vision-and-Language Navigation
references.reason: This paper introduces a history-aware multimodal transformer, a key development that allows the VLN agent to better utilize historical context for improved navigation performance.

references.paper_title: Look Before You Leap: Bridging Model-Free and Model-Based Reinforcement Learning for Planned-Ahead Vision-and-Language Navigation
references.reason: This paper pioneered the integration of reinforcement learning into VLN, a significant methodological contribution that underpins many of the cited studies on this topic.

references.paper_title: BadNets: Evaluating Backdooring Attacks on Deep Neural Networks
references.reason: This seminal paper on backdoor attacks in deep learning provides a foundational understanding of the threats addressed in this research, making it relevant to their exploration of backdoored VLN agents.
